sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
[Book of good counsel to the Scots king]
[4+] leaves
W. Chepman and A. Myllar, [Edinburgh : 1508?]
In Scottish verse. Begins: "Ryght as all stringis ar reullit in ane harp". Leaf signed aii begins: "And cheife na man for hye lordschip na blud". In a manuscript version this has the Latin title: De regimine principum bonum consilium--STC. Title, imprint, and suggested publication date from STC. Imperfect, a fragment. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
=======
